record.description: [In 1983, demolition of the old shop or storehouse, located between 57th and 58th Streets on Ingleside Avenue, began in order to make way for the John Crerar Library. The building initially served as a power and physical plant, but later functioned as a general staff and storage facility after a new University heating plant was constructed south of the Midway.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative on file. Address found in 19976 directory and confirms to location found on map in Dreams in Stone.
